txt.en: Search for anything that might explain why Uialrond was sealed
Listen to the conversation
You should follow Dolenthol into Uialrond, the Dome of Evening.
Instance: A Waxing Moon
Talk to Dolenthol

'I do not see any sign of evil in this place, [placeholder].

'It seems as if it were sealed and forgotten, but why?

'I wonder...'
Follow Dolenthol
You should examine the source of the curious glimmer.
You should find a good spot to look down at the council table of Uialrond.
You should witness the vision of Galadriel.
You have witnessed the hopeful words of Galadriel, and Dolenthol has revealed himself to be the Lady Éowyn before Prince Faramir in Uialrond.\n\nYou should talk to Faramir.
Return to Faeron
The merrevail retreat
Bear witness to the echo of Galadriel
Find a good spot to look down at the council table of Uialrond
Talk to Faramir
<rgb=#FF00FF>Look</rgb> down at the council table of Uialrond
Listen to the conversation
You think you spy something in the centre of the council table below
Examine the source of the curious glimmer
You do not have a good view from here
Defeat the merrevail
This table is covered in a thick layer of dust, but conceals no secrets
This shelf holds many dusty books of Gondorian make
After the wards surrounding Barad Cúron were destroyed, the fell magic sealing Uialrond, the Dome of Evening has been undone.
You find nothing of note buried within this old dust and debris
Only the plated gold on this chair is tarnished
A small lamp-fragment of Lórien glimmers in the darkness and you feel a sudden presence
With Rhadrog and Dolenthol in tow, you should return to Faeron and see how you can help.

'I did not wish for you to come to this place, Éowyn, but here in the darkness, I can think only of how much I have missed you. You are a woman of duty - none may turn you from your charge and indeed, none should dare to!'

Faramir embraces Éowyn.

'These are hopeful tidings from the Lady of Light, though it seems they were spoken long ago.

'Let us hope that they still speak of days to come!'
Dolenthol has just learned that Viznak is actually a goblin.\n\nYou should listen to the conversation.
You are under attack!\n\nDefeat the merrevail attackers.
The echo of Galadriel fades back into the darkness of Uialrond
You should search Uialrond and try to discern why it was sealed.
Viznak has regained consciousness and is speaking with the Rangers.\n\nYou should listen to the conversation.
Uialrond appears to be curiously untouched by the evil in Minas Morgul
You have a clear view from here
A curious glimmer catches your eye!
Dolenthol is standing inside Uialrond, the Dome of Evening.\n\nYou should talk to Dolenthol.
'I supposed the time had come, [placeholder].'
